name: Paper Fire Rookie Arcade
description:
The VR Arcade mini-version of Paper Fire Rookie (Paperville Panic). As the fire departments newest firefighting recruit, it's up to you to save the town. Fight fires, shoot water pistols, blast water shotguns, battle tough bosses and axe and smash your way through an apartment building.

Includes two highly replayable, arcade levels from Paper Fire Rookie (Paperville Panic). Challenge yourself to try to clear the level of enemies and defeat the final boss in the best possible time. Each level: 2-7 minutes per play
